title: These changes to RP prices are a big F*ck You to a Loyal Playerbase.
body:
I've probably *easily* spent in excess of $400-500 since I started playing in **2012**...

...and then you turn around and pull this sh*t on me?

Weren't we promised an RP Loyalty Program 1-2 years ago to reward players for spending IRL money on LoL? Perhaps bring something like that into effect before you start charging us even more for RP.

replies.body: Milk is also going up in price due to economic instability  (assuming you are not lactose intolerant), is it also a big ♥♥♥♥ you to loyal milk drinkers?

Get the %%%% over it, buissness101, they need to make money. stfu, at least they don't charge you $20 a month and then make you pay for each DLC.
No one cares how much you have spent, doesn't make you loyal, makes you an idiot.

The thing with f2p model is that, as long as you spend more than like $20 - 30 you have literally bought a game so you at least have every right to complain about why you don't get a nice product delivered, but

Spending any more doesn't net you any more privileges, unless ofc you're playing into the pay to win model of a game.
I don't mind if Riot says "hey, would you mind paying a little more money for a while?", provided they start by saying "I would like to thank you for investing your time and money into our game."

Yeah except fact is we have been paying them less for being on this server for a long time (the current prices are like 90c to a USD, right now we are 77c to a USD)

So why don't you quit pretending your privileged, and realize that they can do what they want with the prices, and that you don't have to pay a single cent.
Actually, with the release of the OCE server we were already getting less RP than we used to. They're merely updating it again after Abbott further destroyed our economy.

> [{quoted}](name=Red Arrow,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cGKpJFWJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-08T11:42:03.071+0000)
>
> I don't mind if Riot says "hey, would you mind paying a little more money for a while?", provided they start by saying "I would like to thank you for investing your time and money into our game."

Why do you need to be personally thanked?
Do you not think the explanation provided shows more respect?

There is no way in hell Riot Games can claim hardship due to fluctuations in the dollar, they are a billion dollar company who got to where they were based on the way it was before this change, the dollar has been lower than this so why now? RP costs them nothing to create so it is not a case of higher demand than they can supply, there is literally ZERO reason why they should change the pricing. If anything doing this is going to result in people buying less and they very well may plummet in value due to it.

> [{quoted}](name=BackFire,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cGKpJFWJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-08T13:45:02.676+0000)
>
> There is no way in hell Riot Games can claim hardship due to fluctuations in the dollar, they are a billion dollar company who got to where they were based on the way it was before this change, the dollar has been lower than this so why now? RP costs them nothing to create so it is not a case of higher demand than they can supply, there is literally ZERO reason why they should change the pricing. If anything doing this is going to result in people buying less and they very well may plummet in value due to it.

Why now?
Riot stated in the initial thread that had been watching the Australian dollar for the last few months and have been deciding that whole time, whether to alter prices. They aim to infrequently change prices, thus why they waited so long; they intend to match the long term trend of the fallen Aussie dollar.

As to your comment about ZERO reason; how on Earth do you know? While Riot itself is a billion dollar company Riot OCE is not a charitable handout to the OCE community, but a business in itself, that probably has to demonstrate to it's own feasibility. Any resources they need to buy come from the US and they are essentially paying more, any money they make looks like less to Riot NA due to our weaker dollar. 

We have been getting cheaper RP for a year.
The prices are being adjusted to what they should be.
You can not say that Riot OCE are unjustified in doing this as you have no idea what their financial situation is.
people won't buy less.. when that new awesome skin comes out like the new sons, people will empty their wallets just to buy the bloody thing, they don't care about the price, they just want the skin
The real reason is because LoL is now Halal certified (totally true, look it up)
